thread.title: Steve Dominick
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Steve Dominick

author: Steve Dominick
title: Steve Dominick
text: I had read the reviews and was very skeptical before going to American Freight. I was totally satisfied with the customer service, friendliness, and no pressure sales. I got a very fair price much less expensive than the fancy stores. The setting may not be the perfect high dollar showroom, but if know what you are looking for, they have a great selection and great prices. Also the salesmen were super and made every attempt to help satisfy me and did everything to answer my questions and make this a pleasant experience. I highly recommend.
